encyclopedia.content: RESET：重启系统、复位系统，在智能手机或智能PDA产品里，都有一个隐藏的按钮“RESET”，和电脑的重启键是一个作用，就是系统死机卡住等状态下，可按此键重启系统，RESET按键一般隐藏在机器背面或侧面，用随机带的触摸笔可点的到RESET按键。

entry.def: If you reset a machine or device, you adjust or set it, so that it is ready to work again or ready to perform a particular function.

example.ex: As soon as you arrive at your destination, step out of the aircraft and reset your wristwatch.
example.tran: 你一到达目的地，就走出飞机并重新设置手表时间。

entry.def: If a doctor resets a broken bone, they put it back into its correct position.

example.ex: He is recovering from an operation to reset his arm.
example.tran: 他做了一个手臂复位手术，正在恢复。
